summary:
Tomb Raider is a popular video game series featuring the brave archaeologist Lara Croft. It started in 1996 and became a huge hit, with new games released every year. The games are full of action, puzzles, and exploring ancient tombs. Over time, the franchise grew to include movies, comics, and books.

The games have sold millions of copies, and Lara Croft has become a well-known character, even getting awards and records. In 2022, a new company, Embracer Group, took over the franchise, continuing its legacy.
title: Tomb Raider
